Sentece: In healthy subjects the half-life of carteolol was 7.1 h. 63% of the administered dose was recovered unchanged in urine, and in all 84% was excreted by the kidneys.

Title: Pharmacokinetics of carteolol in relation to renal function.
Name: Carteolol

Sentece: The fractional renal excretion of carteolol was virtually constant at various degrees of renal function, and it always exceeded 100%, which indicates that carteolol was actively secreted, even in patients with renal failure.

Name: Carteolol
